com.observability.monitoring.daemon

Interface IDaemonManagerServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaemonManager

    public interface IDaemonManagerServer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    IDaemonManagerServer is RMI server interface of DaemonManager. Client should follow the sequence below to change configurations. 1. Call startConfigurationModification, get true return to continue; 2. Change individual section of configuration by calling changeConfiguration; 3. Call stopConfigurationModification to finish the process. If conf file is saved successfully, collectd process will be restarted to apply changes.
    Author:
    Ying (Joel) Gao History: 1. Created May 29 2015 2. Modified May 30 2015 3. Modified Jun 02 2015

    • Method Detail

      • startConfigurationModification

        boolean startConfigurationModification()
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Start configuration modification process.
        Returns:
        true/false client gets true to continue
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - connection error

      • changeConfiguration

        boolean changeConfiguration(java.lang.String oldconfig,
                            java.lang.String newconfig)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Change configuration of a section. There are two kinds of configurations:
        1. Single line that outside any sections;
        2. Sections (inside < and >);

        For example:

        <LoadPlugin perl>
        Interval 60
        </LoadPlugin>

        If the oldconfig is null, newconfig will be appended to the end of configuration file as a new section.

        This function can be called multiple times to change multiple sections.

        Parameters:
        oldconfig - the old configuration value, for a section, it includes everything.
        newconfig - the new configuration value, for a section, it includes everything.
        Returns:
        true/false
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - connection error

      • replaceWholeConfiguration

        boolean replaceWholeConfiguration(java.lang.String config)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Replace the whole configuration file content with string config.
        Parameters:
        config - the string for new configuration as a whole
        Returns:
        true/false
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - connection error

      • stopConfigurationModification

        boolean stopConfigurationModification()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Stop configuration modification process.
        Returns:
        true/false client gets true to confirm the success of changing configuration
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - connection error
